500: Looks like we have a wild bug here!

developer.text: The best element of software development is an opportunity to change the idea to a working solution. It's not always easy but along with difficulties of requirements there's a constant satisfaction growing. My favourite technologies are JS technologies. The wide range of possibilities and simplicity turn work into joy.

musician.text: My second hobby is music. Spending time playing with my friends and making our own songs make me feel relaxed. I find myself perfectly fine in the spotlight during the concerts, expressing the artistic side of me.

passionate.text: I enjoy every moment and take every chance I get. Everything I do I get actively involved in. I won't let anything to stop me from achieving my goals.

headers: If you believe it will work out,

form.header: or use this contact form to send me an email

subject.invalid: Field has to have 2 to 200 characters

text.invalid: Field has to have 2 to 5000 characters

contact.invalid: Field has to have 2 to 100 characters

technologies.technologiesText: allowing every idea to become reality
technologies.toolsText: with which I maximize my productivity
technologies.skilsText: letting me to avoid any obstacle
